column2: Note: Rankings include only those economies with confirmed GDP estimates. Figures in italics are for 2010 or 2009.
a. Includes Former Spanish Sahara.  b. Exclude South Sudan after July 2011.  c. Data are for the area controlled by the government of the Republic
of Cyprus.  d. Covers mainland Tanzania only.  e. Excludes Abkhazia and South Ossetia.  f. Excludes Transnistria.
